Serie A
Juventus: Douglas Costa impressed by Cristiano Ronaldo's physique
The Brazilian winger did not hesitate to compliment the body of his Portuguese teammate during an interview.
06 Nov 2019, 20:06 by Rafael Da Silva



Adrien RabiotClub previous: Paris Saint-GermainIndemnity: noneIcon Sport



Aaron RamseyClub previous: ArsenalIndemnity: noneIcon Sport



Gianluigi BuffonClub previous: Paris Saint-GermainIndemnity: noneIcon Sport



Merih DemiralClub previous: SassuoloIndemnity: ‚Ç¨ 18 M Icon Sport



Luca PellegriniClub previous: AS RomaPayment: 22 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Cristian RomeroClub previous: Genoa (loaned one more season) Indemnity: 26 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Previous DaniloClub: Manchester CityPayment: 37 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Matthijs De LigtClub previous: Ajax AmsterdamCompensation: ‚Ç¨ 85.5 million Icon Sport

Juventus: all the rookies of the transfer window 2019




Arrived in the summer of 2018 in Turin, Cristiano Ronaldo (33) seems to have a positive effect on his teammates. In the game first, where the Portuguese asserts himself as the leader of this team, he who has been voted best player of Serie A the previous season. Already author of 6 goals in all competitions, he shines under the colors of the Old Lady.




"It makes everyone want to have a body like hers"




Douglas Costa has been in Italy since summer 2017 + 8 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

And Douglas Costa seems pleased with the presence of the former Real Madrid player. According to him, the fivefold Golden Ball has had positive effects on his teammates, including those who lost in fat mass. "I have always eaten well, and now even more, I am 29 years old and I feel it, we often see Ronaldo without his jersey and his physique is impressive, it makes everyone want to have a body like Since his arrival at the club, the percentage of body fat in the working group has decreased, he is incredible and gives everything he can on the ground, "he told Interactive Esporte.
